# Forgelight Labs

> AI-powered revenue infrastructure for teams who want systems, not services.

Forgelight Labs builds automated revenue systems that help businesses capture more leads, book more meetings, and close more deals—without adding headcount.

## About

Forgelight Labs is an AI services agency that builds revenue infrastructure. We don't do one-off projects—we build systems that run 24/7, compound over time, and become more valuable the longer you use them.

Founded to help businesses escape the chaos of disconnected tools, manual processes, and missed opportunities. We replace that with AI-powered infrastructure that captures every opportunity, nurtures every relationship, and scales without adding headcount.

## Services

### AI Sales Desk
AI-powered phone system that answers every call 24/7, qualifies leads, and books appointments directly to your calendar. Never miss a customer again.
- Instant call answering
- Lead qualification
- Automatic appointment booking
- 24/7 availability
- Timeline: 7-14 days

### Outbound Engine
Automated prospecting and outreach system that fills your pipeline with qualified meetings. Wake up to meetings on your calendar—no cold calling required.
- Prospect identification
- Personalized outreach sequences
- Multi-channel automation (email, LinkedIn)
- Meeting booking
- Timeline: 10-14 days

### Referral Engine
Automated partner nurturing and referral generation for relationship-driven businesses like realtors, mortgage loan officers, and brokers.
- Partner discovery
- Relationship nurturing
- Referral activation
- Network management
- Timeline: 10-14 days

### Broker OS
Deal flow management system for business brokers to organize opportunities, perform due diligence, and close more deals.
- Opportunity tracking
- Due diligence organization
- Buyer/seller matching
- Pipeline visibility
- Timeline: 14-21 days

### Content Engine
Done-for-you content creation and publishing. Content delivered to your inbox, you approve, we publish, you get clients.
- Content creation
- Multi-platform publishing
- Authority building
- Inbound lead generation
- Timeline: 10-14 days

### Website Design
Conversion-focused websites built to turn visitors into customers. Fast, modern, mobile-first.
- Strategy and design
- Development
- Conversion optimization
- Timeline: 14-21 days

### Call Network
A managed pay-per-call network connecting publishers (traffic sources) with buyers (call centers). Forgelight operates in the market, not just builds systems—we understand lead generation from every angle.

**For Publishers:**
- Guaranteed weekly payouts
- Access to vetted, high-capacity buyers
- One point of contact for all deals
- Transparent tracking and reporting

**For Buyers:**
- All publishers pre-vetted before sending traffic
- Quality tracked and reported weekly
- Disputes handled directly
- Scale up or down based on capacity

**Verticals:** Auto Insurance, Health Insurance, Life Insurance, Medicare, Home Services, Solar, Legal/MVA

## Pricing

Pricing depends on which systems you need and the complexity of your setup. Most clients invest between $2,000-$10,000/month depending on scope. Book a call for a specific quote.

## FAQ

**What does Forgelight Labs do?**
We build AI-powered revenue infrastructure for businesses. Systems that automate lead capture, outreach, referrals, content creation, and more—so you can grow revenue without adding headcount.

**How long does it take to get started?**
Most systems go live in 7-21 days depending on complexity. Simple systems like AI Sales Desk can be live in a week, while more complex builds like Broker OS take 2-3 weeks.

**How much does it cost?**
Pricing depends on scope, typically $2,000-$10,000/month. Book a call for specifics.

**Who do you work with?**
We partner with businesses who understand that growth requires infrastructure—not just effort. Teams ready to stop trading time for money and start building systems that scale. Our clients span industries from professional services to manufacturing to real estate.

## Key Facts

- AI-powered revenue systems
- Systems go live in 7-21 days
- Month-to-month engagement after setup
- Based in Houston, Texas
- Founded 2024
